title: Wordpress
description: Wordpress setup with a MySQL database and Traefik-prepared labels and automatic TLS via LetsEncrypt
note: Deploys a Wordpress instance connected to a MySQL database. MYSQL_USER, MYSQL_PASSWORD, MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD are the MySQL credentials. TRAEFIK_NAME is used for identification and TRAEFIK_DOMAIN is used for the correct domain mapping.

env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.label: Database root password
env.description: Password used by the MySQL root user.

env.name: TRAEFIK_DOMAIN
env.label: Traefik domain
env.description: The domain Traefik should use for mapping and TLS. Should be without http and www
